segments.text: Good afternoon . Reservations . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'm calling from Tenga Company . I'd like to know if you have rooms available for the nights from October 8 to October 12 . We are going to have a business conference .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I ask how many people there will be in the party ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of room would you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A moment please , sir . Yes , I can confirm 10 rooms for those days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Is there a special rate for a group reservation ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , there is a 10 percent discount .
segments.speaker: S1
